name: AncientHackNSlash
description:
A hack n slash game we quickly made/mashed together in 3 days for a game jam.

With really bad hitbox and unoptimized  npc boss behaviour

Controls

wasd- move

middle mouse - lock on

spacebar -attack

shift -run

ctrl -dodge roll

Compatible with xbox360 gamepad

Game jam page:

https://itch.io/jam/thesemjammay2021/rate/1071403
